This page provides a semi-complete list of all papers published by our
group. If you are interested in the publications authored by a specific group member,
go to their profile and follow their Google Scholar link.

----

```{r bibArticle}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
pubs <- read.csv("./people/andrea_manica_pubs.csv", header=TRUE)
source("./r_scripts/papers_functions.R")
pubs_format_publications(pubs, "A Manica") |> cat(sep='\n\n')
#scholar::format_publications("v8V058QAAAAJ", "A Manica") |> cat(sep='\n\n')
```
